text: @realDonaldTrump That's a lie. It's too bad your base doesn't fact check. Unless they believe the whole world is lying but you!You will NOT be reelected and the Senate Will turn blue snd Dems. will keep the House. Your base is,dying off because they believe Covid-19 is is a hoax!  Resign now!
